name: Mirror of the Ice Barrier
text: During this turn, each time a card(s) is removed from play from your hand, your side of the field, and/or your Graveyard by the effect of an opponent's Effect Monster: ? If a card in your hand is removed from play, remove from play up to 2 random cards in your opponent's hand. ? If a card you control is removed from play, remove from play up to 2 cards your opponent controls. ? If a card in your Graveyard is removed from play, remove from play up to 2 cards in your opponent's Graveyard.
